summary: Adds a new, powerful staff that was once popular in Runescape
descriptionHtml:
[center][url=https://www.facebook.com/johnskyrim][img]http://i.imgur.com/SkMFU4n.png[/img][/url][/center]
[center][youtube]jqdYxrcQJK8[/youtube] [/center]

As an original player of the once great Runescape, one of my favourite weapons was Iban's Staff. It was big, powerful and looked cool as hell. I decided that I wanted to recreate it for use in Skyrim. Learning how to do UV Maps and get a completely new mesh into Skyrim was certainly a learning curve, but I think it turned out pretty good in the end. Let me know what you think!

[b]Location[/b]

You will find the staff in a chest by a Disciple of Iban NPC in Whiterun. I was going to initially make a quest for the Staff as it's quite powerful, but the creation kit is too much to take in at once and I'd rather get this out there and move on to something else.

[b][color=#ffff00]What this mod includes:[/color][/b]Â [b]A unique Staff that shoots a huge ball of fire.[/b]

[img]http://i.imgur.com/qzCZH0C.png[/img]
[b]Installation:[/b]

Extract the files of the archive to your Skyrim Data Folder

ibanstaff.esp
meshes/weapons/ibanstaff
textures/weapons/ibanstaff

[img]http://i.imgur.com/qzCZH0C.png[/img]
[b]Uninstall Instructions:[/b]

Simply delete the following files:

ibanstaff.esp
meshes/weapons/ibanstaff
textures/weapons/ibanstaff

[img]http://i.imgur.com/qzCZH0C.png[/img]
[b]Questions:[/b]

Q. I've never played Runescape, what does the Staff cast?
A. The spell it casts is called Iban Blast, basically a big fireball comes out and then explodes causing burn damage to surrounding enemies

[img]http://i.imgur.com/qzCZH0C.png[/img]
[b]Notes[/b]

If you leave Iban's Staff in the chest and attack anyone in Whiterun, a Guard will take the Staff and use it against you. Be warned!

[img]http://i.imgur.com/qzCZH0C.png[/img]
[center][color=yellow][b]
Please check out my other mods![/b][/color]
